title: Meditation: A Calm Refuge - with the Rain (2020-04-08)
itunes:title: Meditation: A Calm Refuge - with the Rain
description: Meditation: A Calm Refuge - with the Rain (2020-04-08) - This meditation includes a relaxing body scan and guidance on finding a space of peace and balance in the midst of whatever life brings us. Also enjoy the Virginia springtime rain that accompanies us halfway through the meditation.

Also enjoy the Virginia springtime rain that accompanies us halfway through the meditation.
